definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: Jia min on duty in the hospital, meet encore.
sentences.chinese: 佳敏在醫院值班，遇到安可。

sentences.english: Some words can not say, but can be continuously encore.
sentences.chinese: 有些話並不能說，卻能夠不斷安可。

sentences.english: We asked them to play an encore.
sentences.chinese: 我們要求他們演奏安可曲。

sentences.english: The first encore is a fast polka.
sentences.chinese: 第一個安可曲是一段快板波爾卡。

sentences.english: I hope there aren't too many encores !
sentences.chinese: 希望不要有太多的安可纔是。

sentences.english: That night when he left only said a word to me, encore, sorry.
sentences.chinese: 那晚他離開時只對我說了一句話，安可，對不起。

definition: Bes, a minor god of ancient Egypt
used in the transliteration of people's names
